Allowed argument names in tidiers

Source: R/data-argument-glossary.R
argument_glossary.Rd

Allowed argument names in tidiers

argument_glossary

Format

A tibble with 3 variables:

method

One of "glance", "augment" or "tidy".

argument

Character name of allowed argument name.

description

Character description of argument use.

Examples

argument_glossary
#> # A tibble: 55 x 3
#>    method  argument    description
#>    <chr>   <chr>       <chr>      
#>  1 glance  ...         ""         
#>  2 glance  deviance    ""         
#>  3 glance  diagnostics ""         
#>  4 glance  looic       ""         
#>  5 glance  mcmc        ""         
#>  6 glance  object      ""         
#>  7 glance  test        ""         
#>  8 glance  x           ""         
#>  9 augment ...         ""         
#> 10 augment data        ""         
#> # ... with 45 more rows

Contents

  • Format
  • Examples

broom is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
